title: Oru Kadhal Enbathu Lyrics Chinna Thambi Periya Thambi
stanzas:
<div>
Oru Kadhal Enbathu Lyrics Chinna Thambi Periya Thambi

oru kadhal enbadhu
un nenjil ulladhu
un nenjil ulladhu
kannil vandhathadi (2)

pen poove vaai pesu
poongaatraai nee veesi
kathal geetham nee paadu

oru kadhal enbadhu
un nenjil ulladhu
un nenjil ulladhu
kannil vandhathadi

kannipoovu unnai
pinnikolla vendum
muththam podum podhu
ennikolla vaendum.

muthangal sangeetham
paadaatho.
un koonthal paai ondru
podaatho.

kannaa kannaa
un paadu
ennai thandhen
vaerodu

oru kadhal enbadhu
un nenjil ulladhu
un nenjil ulladhu
kannil vandhathadi

unnai pondra pennai
kannaal paarthathillai
unnai andri yaarum
pennaai thondravillai

poovondru thallaadum
thaenodu
manjathil eppodhu
maanaadu.

poovin ullae thaerottam
naalaithaane vellottam
ennodu pan paadu.

oru kadhal enbadhu
un nenjil ulladhu
un nenjil ulladhu
kannil vandhathadi

oru kadhal enbadhu
un nenjil ulladhu
un nenjil ulladhu
kannil vandhathadi

pen poove vaai pesu
poongaatraai nee veesi
kathal geetham nee paadu

oru kadhal enbadhu
un nenjil ulladhu
un nenjil ulladhu
kannil vandhathadi
